data.eml:eml: Ituglanis paraguassuensis sp. n. (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae): a new catfish from the rio Paraguaçu, northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campos-Paiva, Rafael M., Costa, Wilson J. E. M. (2007): Ituglanis paraguassuensis sp. n. (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae): a new catfish from the rio Paraguaçu, northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 1471: 53-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176686
